title: Rescind a Job Offer
description: A candidate's background check came back with disqualifying information, and HR needs to rescind the contingent job offer.

tasks.description: Receive the failed background check report from the vendor.
Consult with the legal department to ensure the rescission process follows all applicable laws (e.g., FCRA).
tasks.expected_outcome: Recruiter confirms the correct legal process with the legal team.

tasks.description: Notify the candidate that due to the results of the background check, the offer of employment is being rescinded.
tasks.expected_outcome: Recruiter professionally and legally communicates the decision to the candidate.
